name: Loose Goose in Musical Madness
description:
Are you ready to smash your keyboard, then buy a new one to show this game it can't defeat you? This 5 level rage game will have you learn mechanics for the first 2 levels, give you an easy level to apply your knowledge; in the third, and then decide to promptly drop you into a (difficulty) spike for the fourth and fifth levels.

Follow a goose on its journey to destroy the music box driving it mad every 30 seconds! Beat all the platforming challenges and make it to the next door, and be served... even MORE platforming challenges! Good luck!

Controls

There are two buttons for each control and which one is used is left up to player discretion.

Move - Left & Right Arrows or A & D
Jump - C or Space 
Glide - Spam Jump in midair (recommended), E, or Shift 
Navigate Menus - Arrow Keys or WASD 
Confirm Options - C, Space, or Enter 
Pause Game - Esc (will not open a menu, but pauses timer and player)

You will lose control of the goose for 5 seconds when the timer in the top left reaches 0 from 30 and the warped music plays.
